p: It was observed that among the deaths there was a mean gap of 5.7 days when the patients were admitted to the hospital after onset of the symptoms. Also a mean gap of 6.4 days between onset of symptom and intake of Tamiflu was noted among the hospitalized patients. Tamiflu was given on same day of admission as per requirement of C-category in 7 cases and 2 nd day in 3 cases and beyond 2 nd day in 3 cases when respiratory signs progressed. Only 4 cases reported to local doctor's consultation before attending referral hospitals.
